title: Natural Language Understanding for Social Connection
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to understand and respond to my voice commands effectively so that I can stay socially connected, manage my calendar, and access news without needing to navigate complex tech configurations.

title: Voice-Activated Scheduling and Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use voice commands to schedule my volunteering activities and set reminders for important tasks, so that I can stay organized and maintain my social connections despite my reduced mobility.

title: Proactive Conversation Starters for Social Connection
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to initiate conversations and suggest topics based on my interests and social connections so that I can stay engaged with my family and friends despite my limited mobility.

title: Voice Command for Task Management
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use voice commands to manage my calendar and communicate with my family, so that I can stay socially connected and organized despite my limited mobility.

title: Error Recovery Mechanisms for Intuitive Interaction – Clarification Prompts for Misunderstood Commands
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide clarification prompts when I give a command that it misunderstands, so that I can easily correct any errors and continue my daily tasks without frustration.

title: Personalized Voice Profiles for Shared Devices
summary: As an older adult, I want to have a personalized voice profile on shared devices so that I can easily access my calendar, make calls, and connect with family without confusion or frustration.

title: Simplified Voice Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want to use natural voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can stay connected, access information easily, and maintain my independence despite my mobility challenges.

title: Automated Daily Activity Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to send me automated reminders for my daily activities so that I can manage my busy schedule, stay socially connected, and remain engaged with my volunteering commitments despite my reduced mobility and arthritis pain.
